title: Special delivery
creator_credit: Eunice Macaulay, John Weldon, Derek Lamb and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Special Delivery looks like a detective story and sounds like a soap opera. A series of misadventures stretches the imagination to its limits, as Alice and Ralph Phelps battle with the snow and the dead mailman. A comic moral tale which warns of the perils of the slippery slope! Winner of the 1979 Academy Award for Best Animated Short.
